title: N172 Turner and Shaw for Trade

posts.post_title: N172 Turner and Shaw for Trade
posts.post_content:
***TRADE PENDING***

Previously posted Turner and newly listed Shaw available.

Looking for similarly conditioned Minneapolis players from the list below.

Brosnan
Daly
Duke
Foster
Graves
Howes
Jantzen
Jevne
Jordan
Miller

Nicholson
Parsons
Robinson

Damn, I just sold my Parsons last week and my Jordan isn't as nice. Fiddlesticks!

[quote name="z28jd" post=1131446]Damn, I just sold my Parsons last week and my Jordan isn't as nice. Fiddlesticks![/QUOTE]

You sold that parsons? :eek: Congrats! :D

posts.post_title: John - So Let's See Your Jordan
posts.post_content:
[quote name="z28jd" post=1131446]...my Jordan isn't as nice...[/QUOTE]

I said "similarly conditioned" not "exactly the same" and you know I'd be willing to make an exception for you! :)

Kevin,

I wish you well in your pursuit.  Dave Schrader has a few on this list.
